animeTitle: I Played Games And Became The Strongest BOSS
otherNames: I played games and became the strongest BOSS, I Became the Strongest Boss by Playing Games, 我打游戏成了最强BOSS, 我打游戏成了最强BOSS 动态漫画 第1季, I became the Strongest Boss in the Game
synopsis: Lu Yao, a terminal patient, accidentally acquires a mysterious account and transmigrates into an otherworldly game called "Extreme Evil Game" to forcibly extend his life. Upon arrival, he immediately becomes number one on the Extreme Evil list and is publicly wanted. In an attempt to evade pursuit, he randomly jumps into an instance only to discover that, as a newbie, his first challenge is the most dangerous "Fierce" level trial—a fierce tug-of-war with a group of extremely evil monsters. Since he's already here, why not go big? Isn't this the joy of living?
